getPagesDirectoryRelativePath

public java.lang.String getPagesDirectoryRelativePath()
Returns:
local location of pages (css, js, ftl, html) This is typically a relative location within the source tree. This can be accessed at runtime via CLAP - either directly in the source tree, or via the jar. See RESTlet docs for details on CLAP

setupDirectories

public void setupDirectories(org.restlet.Router router)
pages (js,css,html,ftl,etc) are all managed locally within this project. This call sets up the corresponding directories from these within the RESTlet server: /css/ /js/ /images/ Any URL starting with this pattern will be mapped to the relevant portion of getPagesDirectoryRelativePath()

Parameters:
router -
